siteMetadata.subtitle: Pellentesque odio nisi, euismod in, pharetra a, ultricies in, diam. Sed arcu.
siteMetadata.title: Writings of Patrick Forringer

markdownRemark.html:
What will we want when there is nothing left for us to make what we want?

What if we keep taking when what we take from screams in agony with every gouge?

The screams are delayed, so we do not hear them.

Where will we go when there is no safe place to go?

How will we sleep if there is nowhere left to call home?

frontmatter.description: What will we want when there is nothing left for us to make what we want?
frontmatter.title: Nothing
